summary: Always run build-services by default so cloud-swarm base image changes rebuild stale service images

changes.description: Swarm-agent no longer skips cloud-swarm/scripts/build-services.sh by default just because mz-php-fpm/mz-nginx/etc tags already exist in the registry. The old tag-only precheck could bypass cloud-swarm's image-label/base-digest rebuild invalidation and leave stale base images (for example an old mz-php-fpm entrypoint) in use during Magento image rebuilds. The legacy behavior remains available by explicitly setting MZ_DEPLOY_SKIP_SERVICE_BUILD_IF_PRESENT=1.
